roleset.name: of an ethnicity not featuring 'white' skin

role.descr: entity identifying as other than white, racially

example.name: the arg
example.text: I.e. 14 % of the british population is non-white , but 14 % of the tories are not correspondingly non-white .

roleset.note: NONWHITE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, black.02. (from nonwhite.01-j)
